snippet: KASHIN--Theda, of Glen Head, NY on June 29, 2016. Beloved wife of Philip. Loving mother of Peter and Tom Kashin and Sarah Klein. Cherished grandmother of Adam and Zoe Kashin and Dov, Yaakov, Shifra and Azriel Klein. Funeral Service 11:30 am Sunday...
lead_paragraph: KASHIN--Theda, of Glen Head, NY on June 29, 2016. Beloved wife of Philip. Loving mother of Peter and Tom Kashin and Sarah Klein. Cherished grandmother of Adam and Zoe Kashin and Dov, Yaakov, Shifra and Azriel Klein. Funeral Service 11:30 am Sunday, July 3 at Whitting Funeral Home, 300 Glen Cove Ave., Glen Head, NY 11545 www.whitting.com Interment to follow at New Montifiore Cemetery, Farmingdale, NY. 1/3
